items.title: VI Live: Barcelona heeft het lastig met stug Espanyol in Catalaanse derby
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we de hoogtepunten in verschillende competities. Met onder meer aandacht voor Celtic - Rangers FC, AFC Bournemouth - Arsenal en Espanyol - Barcelona.

items.title: Bosz vreesde vertrek Veerman: 'Dat doet iets met de groepsdynamiek'
items.summary: Joey Veerman leek deze winterse transferperiode even naar Fenerbah√ße te vertrekken, maar de middenvelder bleef uiteindelijk toch in Eindhoven. Daar is zijn trainer Peter Bosz erg blij mee.

items.title: Mali v Tunisia: Africa Cup of Nations last 16 ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Afcon updates from the 7pm GMT kick-off in Casablanca ‚öΩ Live scores | Follow us over on Bluesky | Email Dominic 3 mins: I‚Äôd suggest, even though it‚Äôs very early in this game, that Mali are going to have to do plenty of defending this evening. Sami Trabelsi waves and points on the sidelines ‚Äì the Tunisian boss must be happy with this start, as Mali‚Äôs Mahamadou Doumbia is booked already. Continue reading...

items.title: Almere City huurt Japanse verdediger die in jeugd Barcelona speelde
items.summary: We zitten in het intermezzo tussen de zomer- en winterwindow, toch druppelt er in het najaar vaak nog een aantal transfers binnen. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: Premier League‚Äôs warped economics make ¬£65m fee for Semenyo a snip | Jonathan Wilson
items.summary: Price tag for winger‚Äôs move to Manchester City would make headlines in any other country but not in England Antoine Semenyo, it seems likely, will soon join Manchester City from Bournemouth for a fee of ¬£65m. Given how well Rayan Cherki and Phil Foden have played from the right this season, it is not immediately obvious why City need him, but the modern game is the modern game, the rammed calendar makes large and flexible squads essential and Pep Guardiola may have some esoteric plan for the Ghanaian anyway. But perhaps what is most striking about the deal is the fee ‚Äì or, more precisely, how little attention it has drawn. English football has become inured to big transfers. The fee feels about right. Semenyo is 25. He has four and a half years left on his contract. He is quick, skilful, intelligent and works hard. He is disciplined, but has the capacity to do the unexpected. Of course a player of his ability costs that much. Yet ¬£65m would make him the third-most expensive player in Bundesliga history. He would be the seventh-most expensive in Serie A history, the 14th-most expensive in La Liga history. Only nine non-English clubs have paid a fee higher than that. Even in Premier League terms, Semenyo sneaks into the top 25. Continue reading...

items.title: Mourinho wint dit keer √©cht dankzij hattrickheld Pavlidis
items.summary: Jos√© Mourinho en Vangelis Pavlidis zijn met een goed gevoel begonnen aan het nieuwe jaar door een zege te boeken op Estoril. Dit keer kon Benfica daadwerkelijk drie punten bijschrijven, nadat Mourinho een week eerder nog zijn eigen lezing had gegeven aan het resultaat. Pavlidis stal de show in het eigen Est√°dio da Luz met een hattrick.

items.title: McGinn's first Premier League double sends Villa second
items.summary: John McGinn gets two goals and Ollie Watkins scores on his 250th appearance for Aston Villa, inflicting a fourth straight league defeat upon Nottingham Forest.

items.title: Brighton end winless spell with victory over Burnley
items.summary: Brighton end their six-game winless run with a comfortable victory over struggling Burnley in the Premier League.

items.title: Wolves beat West Ham to earn first league win of the season
items.summary: Wolves secure a first Premier League win of the season at the 20th attempt as they make light work of fellow strugglers West Ham at Molineux.

items.title: Rice strikes twice as Arsenal beat Bournemouth
items.summary: Declan Rice scores twice, as Premier League leaders Arsenal come from behind to beat Bournemouth following early error.

items.title: Rice at the double to put Arsenal 6 points clear
items.summary: Declan Rice proved why he's a leading candidate to be the Premier League's player of the season by inspiring Arsenal to a come-from behind victory at Bournemouth that opened up a six-point lead on Saturday.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior frontrunner to replace Maresca
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading candidate to succeed Enzo Maresca as Chelsea head coach, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: McKennie scores, David misses pen in Juve draw
items.summary: Weston McKennie scored but Jonathan David had a penalty saved as Juventus were held to a surprise 1-1 draw by relegation-threatened Lecce on Saturday.

items.title: Nuno: West Ham loss the worst of my career
items.summary: West Ham manager Nuno Espirito Santo admitted he was embarrassed after his team crashed to a dismal 3-0 defeat at Premier League bottom side Wolves.

items.title: Alonso unsure when Mbappe (knee) will return
items.summary: Xabi Alonso has admitted he "doesn't know" when Kylian Mbapp√© will return for Real Madrid, saying the club are working to have the star forward back from injury "as soon as possible."

items.title: Declan Rice leads Arsenal to thrilling comeback win at Bournemouth
items.summary: Arsenal‚Äôs revenge mission this week has been a dish best served cold. After Unai Emery‚Äôs Aston Villa felt the force of the Premier League leaders in a 4-1 thrashing, this time it was Andoni Iraola‚Äôs Bournemouth who were vanquished despite being presented with the opening goal by Gabriel Magalh√£es. The Brazilian promptly equalised before Declan Rice capped his return from injury with two goals as Arsenal moved six points clear at the top, even if they had to survive a nervous last 16 minutes after substitute Eli Junior Kroupi pulled one back. Continue reading...

items.title: Mikautadze maakt al vroeg het verschil voor trotse nummer drie Villarreal
items.summary: Mede dankzij Georges Mikautadze hijgt Villarreal de Spaanse toptwee nog altijd in de nek. De ex-Ajacied was zaterdag bij het bezoek aan Elche al vroeg alert met een assist en een goal.

items.title: Rice bags brace as Arsenal go SIX clear at the top!
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Bournemouth‚Äôs match against Arsenal in the Premier League.

items.title: Rice double sends Arsenal six points clear after cracker at Bournemouth
items.summary: Declan Rice's second-half double proved crucial to put Arsenal six points clear at the top of the Premier League table via a 3-2 win over Bournemouth, despite multiple scares on the south coast.

items.title: Kroupi gives Bournemouth hope with sensational strike!
items.summary: Eli Junior Kroupi gives Bournemouth hope with a sensational strike against Arsenal in the Premier League.
